convene.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if a group of people convene, or someone convenes them, they come together, especially for a formal meeting
convene.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a report by experts convened by the National Institutes of Health
convene.translation[1].definitions[0].de: if a group of people convenes, or if someone convenes them, they come together for a formal meeting
convene.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The conference established five committees which would convene in April or May.
It will be necessary to convene a meeting of shareholders.
